meanings.sent1: The carpenter hammered the nailhead into the wood.
meanings.sent2: I found a loose nailhead on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the nailhead as a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as sharp as a nailhead, noticing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nailhead gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A decorative stud with a rounded top.
meanings.sent1: The leather sofa was adorned with nailheads along the edges.
meanings.sent2: She added a touch of elegance to her bag with a nailhead.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer used the nailhead as a unique button.
meanings.sent4: The nailhead on the belt symbolized strength and style.
meanings.sent5: The antique chest was embellished with intricate nailheads.
